entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued January 01 at 4:50PM EST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Wind Chills to drop into the teens in most areas on Sunday... Colder air and gusty northwest winds will work into the Quad State region tonight, behind the broad area of rain that covered the region on Saturday.
